name: Small Cavern
description: You enter a small oblong cavern with rocky walls. A strange fragrant smell wafts through the overpowering odor of bat guano.

north.name: Exit 1
north.description: A narrow tunnel leads to the north

south.name: Exit 2
south.description: Amidst dripping stalagmites, a sturdy wooden door is installed to the south

on: You try to look, but you can't see a thing.
